channel.title: CVE Feed for chrisbadgett -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for chrisbadgett -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4743|2024-06-05T14:16:33.950Z -- chrisbadgett -- lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lms%20for%20elearning
item.description: The LifterLMS – WordPress LMS Plugin for eLearning plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the orderBy attribute of the lifterlms_favorites shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.2 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-4743|2024-06-05T08:33:16.332Z -- chrisbadgett -- lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lms%20for%20elearning
item.description: The LifterLMS – WordPress LMS Plugin for eLearning plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the orderBy attribute of the lifterlms_favorites shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.2 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-0377|2024-03-13T15:27:16.088Z -- chrisbadgett -- lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lms%20plugin%20for%20elearning
item.description: The LifterLMS – WordPress LMS Plugin for eLearning plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'process_review' function in all versions up to, and including, 7.5.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to publish an unrestricted number of reviews on the site.
